publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1497 Mr Brian Monteith: Glasgow's Townhead Church Spire—That the Parliament warmly congratulates local residents on the success of their campaign to save the spire at the Townhead Church in Royston, Glasgow following the award of a £329,000 grant from the Heritage Lottery Fund.

S1M-1497 Mr Brian Monteith: Glasgow's Townhead Church Spire—That the Parliament warmly congratulates local residents on the success of their campaign to save the spire at the Townhead Church in Royston, Glasgow following the award of a £329,000 grant from the Heritage Lottery Fund.
S1M-1497 Glasgow's Townhead Church Spire (lodged on 22 December 2000) Dorothy-Grace Elder*
S1M-1497 Glasgow's Townhead Church Spire (lodged on 22 December 2000) Alex Johnstone*, Mr Keith Harding*
S1M-1497 Glasgow's Townhead Church Spire (lodged on 22 December 2000) Dr Winnie Ewing*

S1M-1497 Mr Brian Monteith: Glasgow's Townhead Church Spire—That the Parliament warmly congratulates local residents on the success of their campaign to save the spire at the Townhead Church in Royston, Glasgow following the award of a £329,000 grant from the Heritage Lottery Fund. Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder, Alex Johnstone, Mr Keith Harding, Dr Winnie Ewing
S1M-1497 Glasgow's Townhead Church Spire (lodged on 22 December 2000) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-1497 Glasgow's Townhead Church Spire (lodged on 22 December 2000) Bill Aitken*
S1M-1497 Glasgow's Townhead Church Spire (lodged on 22 December 2000) Ms Sandra White*
